definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
Eagle or Star Queen Nebula M16

sentences.english: The Eagles prided themselves on being clean living, not using cuss words and treating each other with respect.
sentences.chinese: 老鷹隊自豪於自己的生活嚴謹，不說髒話，尊重他人。

sentences.english: I love him. It's love, not like those scummy Eagles.
sentences.chinese: 我愛他，這是愛，不像那些可惡的老鷹隊。

sentences.english: The Rattlers viewed the Eagles as goody-goody kids.
sentences.chinese: 響尾蛇隊則認爲老鷹隊裝正經。

sentences.english: Fly high in a rainstorm like an eagle. Thresh about in a rough sea like a beach swimmer.
sentences.chinese: 像老鷹在風雨中翱翔，像弄潮兒在海浪中搏擊。

sentences.english: Birds were singing among the trees and an eagle was flying in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 鳥兒在林間鳴囀，一隻老鷹正在空中飛翔。

sentences.english: Once again, they started flying towards the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 老鷹一家再一次出發向山區飛去。

sentences.english: Atlanta is the world's longest life expectancy of birds, the age can have 70 years.
sentences.chinese: 老鷹是世界上壽命最長的鳥類，年齡可過70歲。

sentences.english: The eagle measured six feet from tip to tip.
sentences.chinese: 那隻老鷹兩翼展開時從一翼端至另一翼端長6英尺。

sentences.english: On a day in the autumn, I saw a prairie eagle mortally wounded by a rifle shot.
sentences.chinese: 一天，我看見草場上躺着一隻重傷的老鷹。

sentences.english: The next day the eagles flew towards the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，老鷹一家朝山區飛去。

sentences.english: They waited for a long time until eagle flied back.
sentences.chinese: 他們等了好久，直到老鷹飛了回來。

sentences.english: As you sit the eagle lands and walks over to introduce himself.
sentences.chinese: 當你坐下時，這老鷹飛落到地面並走過來介紹它自己。

sentences.english: Aim To optimize the extraction procedure of the total flavonoids from Litsea coreana.
sentences.chinese: 目的優選老鷹茶總黃酮提取的最佳工藝。

sentences.english: The Hawks front office had cut him a serious check.
sentences.chinese: 老鷹隊管理層對他的關注度已經有所減少。

sentences.english: The eagle dug its sharp claws into my tender flesh.
sentences.chinese: 老鷹將他尖利的爪子扎進我細嫩的肉裏。

sentences.english: Brothers and sisters are playing catch in a lush, Green field.
sentences.chinese: 小弟弟小妹妹們都在大草地上玩老鷹捉小雞。

definition: yelling (sound made by person)/barking/braying/roaring (sound made by animals)
ommatidium (single component of insect's compound eye)/one eye (i.e. one's left or right eye)
